patch.author: 100586436+JonasDov@users.noreply.github.com
patch.comment: Models tree: reduce tree visibility icon flickering when changing visibility.

patch.author: 100586436+JonasDov@users.noreply.github.com
patch.comment: Models tree: Fixed adding elements to always/never drawn lists would cause model to not load its' visibility.

minor.author: 35135765+grigasp@users.noreply.github.com
minor.comment: Introduce an extra state to `TreeNodeCheckboxState` interface - `{ isLoading: true }`. When such state is returned, the "eye" checkboxes are not rendered by `<VisibilityTreeRenderer />` and `<TreeNodeRenderer />`. Previously, we were returning "disabled" state, resulting in disabled checkboxes being briefly shown until the states were loaded.

patch.author: 100586436+JonasDov@users.noreply.github.com
patch.comment: Models tree: Fixed turning on category visibility under a hidden model causing categories of child elements to also become visible.

patch.author: 100586436+JonasDov@users.noreply.github.com
patch.comment: Fix a query being unnecessarily executed after every node visibility change.

patch.author: 100586436+JonasDov@users.noreply.github.com
patch.comment: Adjust models and categories trees in tree widget. They no longer re-query information after users clear active hierarchy filter.

minor.author: 35135765+grigasp@users.noreply.github.com
minor.comment: Allow Model tree's `getFilteredPaths` prop function to return `undefined` paths. In that case, it's considered that filtering should not be applied, and the full unfiltered tree should be loaded.

patch.author: 35135765+grigasp@users.noreply.github.com
patch.comment: Models tree: Stop unnecessarily executing an expensive model elements' count query, whose results we weren't even using.

patch.author: 35135765+grigasp@users.noreply.github.com
patch.comment: Split large queries into smaller chunks to make them execute quicker.

minor.author: 24278440+saskliutas@users.noreply.github.com
minor.comment: Added `getActions` callback to `TreeRenderer` components. It allows to supply custom actions for tree nodes.

patch.author: 100586436+JonasDov@users.noreply.github.com
patch.comment: Models tree: Fixed not all required nodes being auto-expanded when using `getSubTreePaths` together with filtering.

minor.author: 100586436+JonasDov@users.noreply.github.com
minor.comment: Added `getSubTreePaths` option to `UseModelsTreeProps` for restricting the visible hierarchy to a sub-tree of nodes based on instance keys. Unlike `getFilteredPaths`, which controls filtering logic, `getSubTreePaths` limits the scope of the hierarchy, allowing filtering within the specified sub-tree.

minor.author: 100586436+JonasDov@users.noreply.github.com
minor.comment: Updated @itwin/presentation-hierarchies to v1.6.1 and @itwin/presentation-hierarchies-react to 1.7.1

patch.author: 100586436+JonasDov@users.noreply.github.com
patch.comment: Fix categories tree incorectly inverting categories visibility.

patch.author: 24278440+saskliutas@users.noreply.github.com
patch.comment: Added missing peer dependencies.

patch.author: 24278440+saskliutas@users.noreply.github.com
patch.comment: Bumped `@itwin/presentation-hierarchies-react` version.

patch.author: 100586436+JonasDov@users.noreply.github.com
patch.comment: Fix category count query throwing error on large iModels

patch.author: 100586436+JonasDov@users.noreply.github.com
patch.comment: Update itwinjs-core dependencies to v5.0.0

minor.author: 100586436+JonasDov@users.noreply.github.com
minor.comment: `useModelsTree`: The `getFilteredPaths` callback prop now has a `filter` prop, which matches the value of `filter` prop passed to `useModelsTree` hook. This make it more convenient for consumers to filter by instance keys and label at the same time.

minor.author: aruniverse@users.noreply.github.com
minor.comment: Add support for iTwin.js v5.0

minor.author: 100586436+JonasDov@users.noreply.github.com
minor.comment: Fixed merged (categories and models) nodes visibility. Changed `@beta` APIs in a **breaking** way: `ModelsTreeVisibilityHandlerOverrides.getModelDisplayStatus` and `ModelsTreeVisibilityHandlerOverrides.getCategoryDisplayStatus` - `id` and `categoryId` props are now of `Id64Arg` type instead of `Id64String`. Use `Id64` from `@itwin/core-bentley` to access individual IDs.

patch.author: aruniverse@users.noreply.github.com
patch.comment: update presentation deps to versions that properly support core @ 5.0-rc

minor.author: 24278440+saskliutas@users.noreply.github.com
minor.comment: Added ability to disabled hierarchy level filtering in `ModelsTree`.

patch.author: 100586436+JonasDov@users.noreply.github.com
patch.comment: Fixed Categories tree not reacting to Category display changes from Models tree, when they're made on per-model category overrides.

patch.author: 24278440+saskliutas@users.noreply.github.com
patch.comment: Fixed `ModelsTree` and `CategoriesTree` not applying custom hierarchy level size limit.

minor.author: 35135765+grigasp@users.noreply.github.com
minor.comment: Add ability to remove root Subject node from Models and iModel content trees by setting `hideRootSubject: true` in the `hierarchyConfig` prop.

patch.author: 100586436+JonasDov@users.noreply.github.com
patch.comment: Fixed Models tree showing that modeled elements have children, when their sub model is private or when sub model does not have any elements. Now it shows that modeled element has children only when it's sub model has children and is not private.

patch.author: 100586436+JonasDov@users.noreply.github.com
patch.comment: Fixed Categories tree showing definition containers that contain categories without elements. Now it displays definition containers only when they have categories that contain elements.

none.author: 35135765+grigasp@users.noreply.github.com
none.comment: Make hiding root subject in Models and iModel content trees opt-in

patch.author: 24278440+saskliutas@users.noreply.github.com
patch.comment: Update import to use `@itwin/core-bentley` for types that are reexported by `@itwin/core-common`

minor.author: 100586436+JonasDov@users.noreply.github.com
minor.comment: `CategoriesTree` component rendered `Categories` as a flat list, where each `Category` had zero or more child `SubCategories`. Some iTwin.js applications started to group `Categories` under `DefinitionContainers` and wanted to see them displayed in `CategoriesTree` component. Added `DefinitionContainers` to `CategoriesTree` component. This change doesn't affect applications that don't have `DefinitionContainers`.

patch.author: 100586436+JonasDov@users.noreply.github.com
patch.comment: Adjusted modeled element / sub-model visibility controls. Now, if visibility of modeled element is changed, visibility of sub-model is adjusted accordingly and vice versa.

patch.author: 24278440+saskliutas@users.noreply.github.com
patch.comment: Removed horizontal scroll from trees.

minor.author: 35135765+grigasp@users.noreply.github.com
minor.comment: Expose `FocusedInstancesContextProvider` and `useFocusedInstancesContext` to allow using `ModelsTreeComponent.ToggleInstancesFocusButton` from outside of `ModelsTreeComponent` and accesing the context from other React components.

minor.author: 35135765+grigasp@users.noreply.github.com
minor.comment: Add `filterButtonsVisibility` prop to `TreeRenderer`. The prop allows to control visibility of hierarchy level filtering buttons in the tree: `show-on-hover` (default) shows them on hover or focus, `hide` only shows them when a node is filtered.

minor.author: 35135765+grigasp@users.noreply.github.com
minor.comment: Define `type` and `exports` attributes in `package.json`. The `exports attribute prohibits access to APIs that are not intended to be used by external consumers. The `type: "module"` attribute addition moves this package a step closer towards dropping CommonJS support - it's now transpiled from ESM to CommonJS instead of the opposite.

minor.author: 35135765+grigasp@users.noreply.github.com
minor.comment: Add support for AppUI 5.x

patch.author: 43886789+MartynasStrazdas@users.noreply.github.com
patch.comment: Fix visibility button with no content rendering empty tooltip.

patch.author: 100586436+JonasDov@users.noreply.github.com
patch.comment: Fixed a bug in `CategoriesTreeDefinition.createInstanceKeyPaths`, where sometimes incorrect key paths would be created. Because of this, `CategoriesTree` would show incorrect categories with applied label filter.

patch.author: 100586436+JonasDov@users.noreply.github.com
patch.comment: Changed `onHierarchyLoad` to log errors to console

patch.author: anmolshres98@users.noreply.github.com
patch.comment: Propagate `enableVirtualization` flag down to the underlying `Tree` component from `iTwinUI`

patch.author: 100586436+JonasDov@users.noreply.github.com
patch.comment: Increase performance consistency when creating filtering paths from target items.

patch.author: 100586436+JonasDov@users.noreply.github.com
patch.comment: Reduced main thread blockage ~3 times when creating filtering paths from target items.

patch.author: 35135765+grigasp@users.noreply.github.com
patch.comment: Bump dependencies

minor.author: 35135765+grigasp@users.noreply.github.com
minor.comment: Added an optional `selectionPredicate` function prop to `ModelsTreeComponent`, `ModelsTree`, `useModelsTree` and `Tree` components. When provided, it allows consumers to conditionally enable/disable selection of tree nodes.

patch.author: 24278440+saskliutas@users.noreply.github.com
patch.comment: Bump dependencies

patch.author: 43886789+MartynasStrazdas@users.noreply.github.com
patch.comment: Add missing tooltips

patch.author: 35135765+grigasp@users.noreply.github.com
patch.comment: Reduce the number of queries being executed when always/never drawn sets change.

patch.author: 24278440+saskliutas@users.noreply.github.com
patch.comment: Improve performance of visibility status calculation and visibility changes. Also reduce main thread blocking to avoid UI freezing.

minor.author: 24278440+saskliutas@users.noreply.github.com
minor.comment: Replaced `ModelsTreeVisibilityHandlerOverrides.changeElementState` with `ModelsTreeVisibilityHandlerOverrides.changeElementsState`. The method is provided with a list of elements instead of single element to allow changing visibility of multiple elements in single batch istead of one by one.

patch.author: 24278440+saskliutas@users.noreply.github.com
patch.comment: Reduce UI blocking when checking visibility status

patch.author: 35135765+grigasp@users.noreply.github.com
patch.comment: Update ECSQL queries to always use `.Id` suffix when querying navigation properties - that substantially improves query performance.

patch.author: 100586436+JonasDov@users.noreply.github.com
patch.comment: Models tree: Improved performance of creating instance key paths for large numbers of target instances by up to 200x.

patch.author: 24278440+saskliutas@users.noreply.github.com
patch.comment: Updated `TreeNodeRenderer` to pass `ref` to the underlying `TreeNodeRenderer` from `@itwin/presentation-hierarchies-react`.

patch.author: 35135765+grigasp@users.noreply.github.com
patch.comment: Bump `presentation` package dependencies for bug fixes and orders of magnitude hierarchy filtering performance improvement.

major.author: 35135765+grigasp@users.noreply.github.com
major.comment: The `3.0` release affects nearly all components in this package, usually in a breaking way. As a result, we suggest treating this version as a completely new package rather than an incremental upgrade - please have a look at the [README](./README.md) for a list of new features and examples on how to consume the new version

patch.author: 24278440+saskliutas@users.noreply.github.com
patch.comment: Removed usage of `require` as it is not supported in ES modules

patch.author: 24278440+saskliutas@users.noreply.github.com
patch.comment: Fixed newly inserted subject node visibility not changing

patch.author: 24278440+saskliutas@users.noreply.github.com
patch.comment: Fixed `ModelsTree` not changing visibility for child elements.

minor.author: 33428304+jasdom@users.noreply.github.com
minor.comment: Added support for custom start icons in `TreeSelector`.

minor.author: 33428304+jasdom@users.noreply.github.com
minor.comment: Added ability to track usage of `TreeWidget` features.

minor.author: 33428304+jasdom@users.noreply.github.com
minor.comment: Added ability to track performance of `TreeWidget` component features. Requires `@itwin/presentation-components` version `5.1` or higher

patch.author: 24278440+saskliutas@users.noreply.github.com
patch.comment: ModelsTree: Improved performance when changing visibility of multiple element nodes at the same time.

patch.author: 24278440+saskliutas@users.noreply.github.com
patch.comment: Removed border appearing around search button.

patch.author: 24278440+saskliutas@users.noreply.github.com
patch.comment: Updated trees to always react to data changes and auto update.

minor.author: 33428304+jasdom@users.noreply.github.com
minor.comment: Tree Widget: Updated header and its content to be touch friendly when using expanded layout.

minor.author: 24278440+saskliutas@users.noreply.github.com
minor.comment: Added React 18 support.

minor.author: 114080994+ViliusBa@users.noreply.github.com
minor.comment: Models Tree: zoom to viewport element on node double-click.

minor.author: 114080994+ViliusBa@users.noreply.github.com
minor.comment: Tree Widget: allow opt-in to hierarchy level size limiting.

minor.author: 114080994+ViliusBa@users.noreply.github.com
minor.comment: Tree Widget: Allow opt-in to hierarchy level filtering using `isHierarchyLevelFilteringEnabled` flag for all trees. Add support for `enlarged` nodes in non-visibility trees.

minor.author: 114080994+ViliusBa@users.noreply.github.com
minor.comment: Move `VisibilityTreeEventHandler.onNodeDoubleClick` event handler to newly added `ModelsTreeEventHandler`. Expand `useVisibilityTreeState` hook to support custom `VisibilityTreeEventHandler`'s.

none.author: 24278440+saskliutas@users.noreply.github.com
none.comment: Tree Widget: Fix possible `onCheckboxStateChanged` failure when multiple `rxjs` versions are present (#750)

major.author: 24278440+saskliutas@users.noreply.github.com
major.comment: Bumped AppUI peer dependencies version to `^4.10.0`.

patch.author: 114080994+ViliusBa@users.noreply.github.com
patch.comment: Models Tree: For all header actions only consider Models that model either `InformationPartitionElement` or `GeometricElement3d`. This should omit Models that are not displayed in the component.

patch.author: 24278440+saskliutas@users.noreply.github.com
patch.comment: Fixed progress indicator positioning in enlarged tree layout.

patch.author: 24278440+saskliutas@users.noreply.github.com
patch.comment: Fixed `onCheckboxStateChanged` event handling when multiple `rxjs` versions are present.
Fix padding for icons when elements are enlarged.
Fix progress indicator sizing in `enlarged` layout

minor.comment: `ModelsTree`: Add an option to pass `modelsVisibilityHandler` as a factory function.

patch.comment: Fix spacing between expander and label in iModelContentTree component.
Fix Models tree search not loading Subject nodes with hidden content models
`Trees`: Do not select node when checkbox is clicked.
Trees: Fix eye checkbox background when node is selected and hovered.

minor.comment: Trees: Added ability to increase node size in order to make tree more user friendly on touch devices.
Trees: Added ability to customize tree node label
`ModelsTree`: Added ability to show models without elements.
Added context menu support.

patch.comment: Removed `@itwin/itwinui-variables` from dependencies.

minor.comment: Models tree: Removed expansion toggle for root node.
Widget: Added ability to conditionally show trees.
Trees: Decrease whitespace size between the node label and eye checkbox.
Added base tree props interface for props shared between trees.
External sources tree: Add `ExternalSourcesTreeComponent` (currently `@alpha`).
Models tree: Added an option to specialize the class of geometric elements loaded into the hierarchy (see `ModelsTreeHierarchyConfiguration.elementClassSpecification`).
Trees: Use search box from the `@itwin/itwinui-react` library.

patch.comment: Trees: Keep child nodes state the same after parent node re-expands.
Categories tree: Fixed behavior of the Invert button. Previously, only categories were affected, now sub-categories are affected as well.
Handle errors thrown from tree components.
Persist tree scroll position when switching between widgets.
`Tree Header`: Fixed dropdown buttons menu not theming correctly.
`ModelsTree`: Refactor ruleset to not use deprecated `ImageIdOverride` rule.
`ModelsTree`: Always render checkbox to avoid UI shifting when checkbox appear.

major.comment: Trees: Make eye checkboxes static on horizontal scroll.
`createVisibilityTreeNodeRenderer` now takes a `props` object of type `VisibilityTreeNodeRendererProps`. It contains two new configuration options: `levelOffset`, and `disableRootNodeCollapse`.
Rename `useVisibilityTreeRenderer` to `createVisibilityTreeRenderer`. It now takes a `props` object of type `VisibilityTreeRendererProps`

Widget: Reworked the way trees are provided to the widget. Instead of having separate configuration properties for hiding default trees and adding additional trees now there is only one property for supplying a list of trees to show.
`IVisibilityHandler`: Methods `getVisibilityStatus` and `changeVisibility` don't take `NodeKey` argument anymore.
Models tree: `ModelsTreeProps.enableElementsClassGrouping` has been moved to `ModelsTreeProps.hierarchyConfig.enableElementsClassGrouping`.

none.comment: Enforce consistent usage of type imports.
`TreeHeader`: Debounce searchbox input to avoid making multiple requests.
Updated trees to use visibility checkbox from `@itwin/itwinui-react`.

minor.comment: Updated to AppUI 4.0 and Presentation 4.0.
Removed `SpatialTree` and related components in favor of the ones in `@itwin/breakdown-trees-react`.
Updated dependencies (`itwinui@2`, `appui@4`, `presentation-components@4`, `itwinjs-core@3.7`).

patch.comment: Use iTwin UI components instead of custom ones and CSS variables from `@itwin/itwinui-variables` instead of `@itwin/core-react`.
Fixed tree filtering not being removed when search box is closed.
'ModelsTree': Restored 'HideAll' button behavior to hide only models.
ModelsTree: ensure that the "Show all" button is going to show all elements when there are elements with an "exclusive" flag.
'2d' and '3d' buttons react to visibility changes in the viewport. The '2d' button will be disabled if no models with the PlanProjection flag are present in the model.

minor.comment: Add an option to control what buttons are available in tree toolbars.
Upgrade `itwinjs-core` dependencies to `^3.6.0`.
Upgrade `typescript` to `~4.4.0`.

patch.comment: `ModelsTreeComponent`: ensure that the "show all" and "hide all" buttons affect all iModel content.
`ModelsTree`: Remove unused feature of filtering the tree by element ids.
`CategoryTree`: Updated ruleset to not show private SubCategories.
Bug fix for changing visibility of multiple nodes at once.

minor.comment: Moved core trees implementation from `@itwin/appui-react` package to `@itwin/tree-widget-react`.
Add new `defaultTreeId` prop to specify default tree for `TreeWidgetUiItemsProvider`.

patch.comment: Fix GeometricElement nodes not being shown in `IModelContentTree`.
Allow a caller to specify a default priority for `TreeWidgetUiItemsProvider`.
Set restore transient state in `TreeWidgetUiItemsProvider` to restore state when remounted.
Set tree-widget-search-bar-button-container z-index to 1.
Do not unmount children in `AutoSizer` when height or width is 0 to avoid losing children state.
Fixed search bar container to take up entire width of widget when open.

none.comment: Add transitive peers as dev deps.

patch.comment: Allow specifying default panel location.
Added tree icon to tree widget tab.

minor.comment: Remove deprecated `WidgetControl`, update `UiItemsProvider` initialization.
Add `IModelContentTree`.

patch.comment: Update scss to be pulled from cjs dir.

minor.comment: Bump to official iTwin.js 3.0 release.

patch.comment: Updated to latest rc, dev-185, and updated deps.
iTwin.js 3.0 first rc.
